channel.title: News on Mark Chmarny
channel.description: Recent content in News on Mark Chmarny

item.title: Thinking Big about Data at Intel
item.description: I am excited to share with you today that starting Monday I will be joining the Big Data team at Intel. Yes, Intel. While not traditionally known for its software offerings, Intel has recently entered the Big Data space by introducing their own, 100% open source Hadoop distribution with unique security and monitoring features.
